<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind-Tossed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=2993) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 207 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98)

**Prerequisites**
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2986)

</column>

---

You enhance your spell with elemental air, using the wind to find your target and carry your magic around cover. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll, you ignore the target's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition and any cover they have from you. The spell gains the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) trait.
name: Wind-Tossed Spell
